mapper.select: select m.perms from t_role r join t_user_role ur on(r.role_id = ur.role_id) join t_role_menu rm on(rm.role_id = r.role_id) join t_menu m on(m.menu_id = rm.menu_id ) where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.perms is not null and m.perms <> ''

select m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, t_system.domain||m.url url, m.perms, m.icon from t_menu m join t_system on m.sys_code=t_system.code and m.type='0' and m.MENU_ID in (select distinct rm.menu_id from t_role_menu rm left join t_role r on(rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_user_role ur on(ur.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.user_id = #{userId}) order by t_system.sort_num asc,m.order_num asc
